alert.note: Alert for Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:23PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pima County through 315 PM MST... At 223 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles east of Pisinemo, or 14 miles northwest of Sells, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pisinemo, Gu Oidak, Cowlic, No:ligk, Cababi, San Luis - Sells District, Santa Cruz, Mountain Village, Rincon, Kots Kug and Kupk. This includes Route 86 between mile markers 81 and 90, and between mile markers 93 and 111. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
